html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08842024-07-18PS
ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectProvincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 260, Quebec
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER No. 260 in order to (1) declare the natural disaster to be of concern to the federal government; and (2) authorize the provision of financial assistance to Quebec with respect to the interface fires that occurred from May 28 to August 24, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
